active_projects.description: Update state-management.md to add dependencies array field to task entries for machine-readable dependency tracking. This is the foundational schema change that enables all other dependency handling improvements.

artifacts.summary: Research report documenting state.json dependencies field schema, validation requirements, and TODO.md format specification
4-phase implementation plan for documenting dependencies field in state-management.md schema
Implementation summary documenting all changes to state-management.md for dependencies field

active_projects.completion_summary: Documented the dependencies field in state-management.md including state.json schema example, TODO.md entry format, field specification table with type/default/description, format conversion rules between state.json and TODO.md, and validation requirements (valid references, no circular dependencies, no self-reference).
active_projects.claudemd_suggestions: Updated .claude/rules/state-management.md with Dependencies Field Schema section (lines 177-196) documenting the dependencies array field for task dependency tracking

active_projects.description: Update meta-builder-agent.md Stage 3 IdentifyUseCases to explicitly capture dependency relationships with validation (must reference valid task numbers, no circular dependencies).

artifacts.summary: Research report with Stage 3 gap analysis, proposed Question 5 for dependency capture, validation logic, and implementation recommendations

active_projects.description: Update meta-builder-agent.md Stage 6 CreateTasks to implement topological sorting of tasks based on dependency graph so foundational tasks get lower numbers and are created first.
Modify TODO.md insertion logic to insert tasks in dependency order (foundational tasks higher in file) instead of always prepending.
Update meta-builder-agent.md Stage 7 DeliverSummary to show dependency graph visualization and execution order based on actual assigned task numbers.

artifacts.summary: Research report documenting Unicode block characters, lualine patterns, color conventions, and AI statusline integrations for Claude Code context display
Revised plan: Update statusline-push.sh to use Unicode block characters instead of ASCII brackets
Updated statusline-push.sh to use Unicode block characters for progress bar display

active_projects.completion_summary: Updated Claude Code statusline hook script to use Unicode block characters (█░) instead of ASCII bracket notation ([=][-]) for the progress bar. The display now shows clean progress bars like '50% █████░░░░░ 100k/200k' instead of cluttered '50% [[=][=][=][=][=][-][-][-][-][-]] 100k/200k'.

artifacts.summary: Root cause analysis: statusLine must be top-level field (not nested in hooks), with workaround for known external script bug
5-phase plan to fix statusLine config, update script field names, and verify end-to-end functionality
Implementation summary with verification and post-implementation steps

active_projects.completion_summary: Fixed Claude Code settings.json statusLine configuration by moving it from nested hooks object to correct top-level position. Updated statusline-push.sh script to use official JSON schema field names. Created inline command fallback for external script invocation bug workaround.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research on Claude Code context API, VS Code implementation, Neovim plugin patterns, and three feasible implementation approaches with recommendation for custom sidebar panel
Follow-up research on lualine extensions, Claude Code buffer detection, custom component creation, and context data fetching via statusline JSON file
Push-based architecture research covering Claude Code hooks, vim.uv file watching, and complete implementation code for statusline integration
4-phase implementation plan for Claude Code context display in lualine

active_projects.completion_summary: Implemented Claude Code context usage display in Neovim lualine using a push-based architecture. Created a statusLine hook script that writes JSON to /tmp/claude-context.json, a Lua reader module with vim.uv file watching, and a custom lualine extension showing context percentage with color-coded progress bar, token counts, model name, and cost.

active_projects.description: Add plan file status verification to /implement GATE OUT checkpoint and make implementation skills more explicit about plan file updates. Currently plan files are not reliably updated to [COMPLETED] status after implementation finishes (documented in skills but not executed). Fix: (1) Add verification step in implement.md GATE OUT that checks plan file status matches task status and updates if needed (defensive backup), (2) Make the sed command in skills Stage 7 more explicit with error checking and verification output.

artifacts.summary: Analysis of plan file status update gaps in /implement GATE OUT and skills Stage 7, with recommendations for verification and fixes
3-phase plan to fix plan file status updates in /implement command and implementation skills
Implementation summary documenting changes to implement.md and 4 implementation skills

active_projects.completion_summary: Added plan file status verification to /implement GATE OUT as defensive backup, and improved sed commands in skill-neovim-implementation, skill-implementer, skill-latex-implementation, and skill-typst-implementation with dual pattern support (bullet and non-bullet), verification output, and graceful missing file handling.
active_projects.claudemd_suggestions: Modified .claude/commands/implement.md (added step 5 to GATE OUT), .claude/skills/skill-neovim-implementation/SKILL.md (added preflight and postflight plan updates), .claude/skills/skill-implementer/SKILL.md, .claude/skills/skill-latex-implementation/SKILL.md, .claude/skills/skill-typst-implementation/SKILL.md (improved sed commands in all three)
